sell.placeholderOfferSellTokenAddress: Search the token you want to sell
sell.placeholderOfferBuyTokenAddress: Put the address of the token you want to buy
sell.placeholderOfferPrivatBuyerAddress: Put the address of the private buyer
sell.placeholderPrice: Number of purchase tokens for one token on sale
sell.checkboxLabelPrivateOffre: I want to create a private offer
sell.invalidPrivateOfferAddress: Unable to create an offer for your address

chooseOfferType.title: Which type of offer do you want to create ?
chooseOfferType.buyTypeExplain: Choose "{{ offerType, String }}" offer's type when you want to buy a RealT property token with other non Realt tokens (WXDAI, WETH, USDC etc...)
chooseOfferType.sellTypeExplain: Choose "{{ offerType, String }}" offer's type when you want to sell a RealT property token against other non Realt tokens (WXDAI, WETH, USDC etc...)
chooseOfferType.exchangeTypeExplain: Choose "{{ offerType, String }}" offer's type when you want to exchange a RealT property token against other tokens (WXDAI, WETH, USDC etc...) or against another RealT property token, or two non RealT token between them.
